title: The Collected Works of G.K. Chesterton Volume 06: The Napoleon of Notting Hill; The Man Who Was Thursday; The Club of Queer Trades
description: Introduction by Dr. Denis Conlon, University of Antwerp T.S. Eliot, Evelyn Waugh, C.S. Lewis and W.H. Auden all recognized Chesterton as a giant literary figure. This volume contains G.K. Chesterton's earliest and greatest novels. The reader will encounter characters that defend with great vigor the diginity of the person and fundamental Christian beliefs. This volume is graced with Chesterton's own drawings and photos, as well as maps.
author: G.K. Chesterton
